ingredients: 4 Vietnamese baguettes or French rolls (or regular baguettes cut into 6-inch pieces)
1 cucumber, thinly sliced lengthwise into ribbons
Maggi seasoning sauce or soy sauce for drizzling (optional)
steps: Slice baguettes lengthwise, leaving one edge attached (hinge-style)
Toast bread cut-side up under broiler for 1-2 minutes or in toaster oven until lightly golden
Spread mayonnaise (mixed with sriracha if using) on both sides of bread
Layer tofu planks on bottom half
Top with drained pickled vegetables, cucumber ribbons, jalapeño slices, cilantro sprigs, and mint leaves
Drizzle with Maggi or soy sauce if desired
title: Lemongrass Tofu Banh Mi
